title: Angel Dear Jacquard Blanket, Swan Coral
features: Luxuriously soft 100% cotton muslin softens with every wash.
Rolled and Tied with Signature Grosgrain Ribbon
description: Classic with a modern twist , our lightweight, double-layer muslin jacquard blanket is the perfect gift. Exceptionally soft 100% cotton muslin is gentle on your baby's skin. Contrasting back and front pattern, finished with mitered corners.
